ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup pure maple syrup, divided
½ cup whipped cream, or to taste

cookingTips: Cook bacon until crispy, then brush with maple syrup while still warm for candied effect
Blend ice cream and milk until smooth before adding bacon pieces
Reserve some candied bacon for garnish on top of the shake
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help me create a decadent maple bacon milkshake with crispy-sweet bacon pieces and proper balance of flavors.
